com.facebook.litho.widget

Class SectionsRecyclerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SwipeRefreshLayout
      • com.facebook.litho.widget.SectionsRecyclerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasLithoViewChildren

    public class SectionsRecyclerView
extends SwipeRefreshLayout
implements HasLithoViewChildren
    Wrapper that encapsulates all the features RecyclerSpec provides such as sticky header and pull-to-refresh
